mapper.update: update shop_evaluate set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ev_all = #{evAll,jdbcType=REAL}, ev_comment = #{evComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ev_pic = #{evPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ev_id = #{evId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ev_id, shop_id, user_id, ev_all, ev_comment, ev_pic from shop_evaluate
